Accessibility

App Support

Category: Subscriptions

I can see my issues on my iPad but not on my iPhone

Any previous purchases you have made will be tied to your Apple ID. You can restore your previous purchases at any time.

  1. Open the App menu
  2. Tap ‘Manage Account’
  3. Tap ‘Restore Purchases’ and enter your Apple ID password if prompted

Already tried this?

If you are still experiencing the problem, contact support using any of the options below.

  • Call 0800 123 4567
  • Submit a support request
  • Leave app feedback
  • Privacy policy
